00036 #define ARMin(a, b) \
00037         ({ \
00038                 __typeof__ (a) _a = (a); \
00039                 __typeof__ (b) _b = (b); \
00040                 MIN(_a, _b); \
00041         })
00042 
00051 #define ARMax(a, b) \
00052         ({ \
00053                 __typeof__ (a) _a = (a); \
00054                 __typeof__ (b) _b = (b); \
00055                 MAX(_a, _b); \
00056         })
00057 
00067 #define ARClamp(v, l, u) \
00068         ({ \
00069                 __typeof__ (v) _v = (v); \
00070                 __typeof__ (l) _l = (l); \
00071                 __typeof__ (u) _u = (u); \
00072                 MAX(_l, MIN(_v, _u)); \
00073         })
